General.Name: Yunnan Bowin Technology Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Bowin Technology Industry Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells cement in China. The company offers ordinary Portland cement, composite Portland cement, masonry cement, mud, and ordinary Portland water products. It also provides frozen matsutake mushrooms and other edible mushroom products under the Grilla brand. In addition, the company is involved in the foreign investment business comprising operation and import of raw and auxiliary materials, mechanical equipment, instruments, meters, and spare parts, as well as trading business. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Kunming, China.
General.Address: Eastern Airlines Investment Building, Kunming, China, 650041
